instruction: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper, and cook in a non-stick skillet until fluffy. Serve with toast and butter.
Combine rolled oats, milk, Greek yogurt, honey, and vanilla extract in a jar and refrigerate overnight. Top with fresh fruit and nuts in the morning.
Mash avocado with lime juice, salt, and pepper and spread on toast. Top with a fried egg or cherry tomatoes.
Scramble eggs with sausage, peppers, onions, and cheese, and wrap in a tortilla. Serve with salsa and sour cream.
Mix pancake batter and add in blueberries or sliced bananas. Cook on a griddle and serve with maple syrup.
Fry an egg and place it on a toasted English muffin with bacon, cheese, and arugula.
Layer Greek yogurt with granola and fresh berries or sliced bananas.
Fill a tortilla with scrambled eggs, ham, and cheese, and cook in a non-stick skillet until cheese is melted.
Blend frozen fruit, Greek yogurt, and almond milk until smooth and thick. Top with granola and fresh fruit.
Simmer eggs in a spicy tomato sauce with onions, bell peppers, and cumin. Serve with crusty bread.
Mix eggs, milk, cheese, and cooked bacon or vegetables and pour into a pie crust. Bake until golden and set.
Mix waffle batter and cook in a Belgian waffle iron. Serve with whipped cream and fresh berries.
Fry eggs and place on top of tortillas with refried beans, salsa, and avocado slices.
Toast a bagel and spread with cream cheese. Top with smoked salmon and capers.
Whisk eggs with cheese, vegetables, and herbs, and cook in a non-stick skillet until set. Cut into wedges and serve with toast.
Grill cheese between two slices of bread and serve with a bowl of tomato soup.
Mix canned tuna with mayonnaise, diced celery, and pickles. Serve on bread with lettuce and tomato.
Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Add grilled chicken for protein.
Fill a tortilla with shredded chicken, cheese, and vegetables, and cook in a non-stick skillet until cheese is melted.
Layer sliced turkey, ham, bacon, lettuce, and tomato on toasted bread with mayonnaise.
Layer sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
Mix chickpeas with diced vegetables, feta cheese, and a lemon vinaigrette.
Top a baked potato with shredded cheese, sour cream, and chives. Add bacon or chili for extra flavor.
Spread hummus on a tortilla and add sliced vegetables like cucumber, carrot, and bell pepper. Roll up and slice.
Fill a pita with falafel, lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce.
Mix cooked pasta with chopped vegetables, olives, feta cheese, and Italian dressing.
Layer bacon, lettuce, and tomato on bread with mayonnaise.
Grill a veggie patty and serve on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and avocado.
Fill sushi rice with avocado, cucumber, and cooked shrimp or crab. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
Toss lettuce with feta cheese, olives, red onion, and a lemon vinaigrette. Add grilled chicken or shrimp for protein.
Season chicken with herbs and grill until cooked through. Serve with roasted vegetables like zucchini, squash, and bell peppers.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions and serve with homemade or store-bought meatballs and marinara sauce.
Grill or bake fish and serve in corn tortillas with shredded cabbage, salsa, and avocado.
Stir-fry sliced beef with vegetables like broccoli, bell peppers, and onions. Serve over rice.
Fill bell peppers with cooked rice, ground beef or turkey, and diced vegetables. Bake until peppers are tender.
Season salmon fillets with lemon and herbs and roast in the oven. Serve with roasted asparagus.
Cook chicken in a spicy curry sauce with vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and peas. Serve over rice.
Grill or saut√© sliced steak, chicken, or vegetables and serve with tortillas, salsa, and guacamole.
Cook beef with vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and onions in a rich beef broth until tender.
Layer cooked lasagna noodles with ricotta cheese, tomato sauce, and ground beef. Top with mozzarella cheese and bake until bubbly.
Layer cooked ground beef or lamb with mashed potatoes and bake until golden brown.
Stir-fry a variety of vegetables like broccoli, carrots, snow peas, and mushrooms. Serve over rice or noodles.
Season shrimp with garlic and herbs and grill on skewers. Serve with a side salad.
Bread chicken breasts with breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese and bake until crispy. Serve with marinara sauce and spaghetti.
Cook black beans with ground beef or turkey, diced tomatoes, and chili powder. Serve with shredded cheese and sour cream.
